home.heroTitle: Welcome to Our Village’s Digital Platform
home.heroSubtitle: Empowering communities through digital transformation and transparent governance
home.aboutText1: Our village represents the perfect blend of rich cultural heritage and modern development. We are committed to improving the quality of life for all residents through innovative initiatives and transparent governance.
home.aboutText2: This platform connects villagers with development plans, showcases our talented community members, provides access to government schemes, and keeps everyone informed about ongoing transformations.
home.highlightsSubtitle: Navigate through different sections to discover more

aboutVillage.heroSubtitle: Rich in culture, strong in community, progressing towards a brighter future
aboutVillage.historyText1: Our village was established in the early 1800s by pioneering farmers who recognized the fertile land and abundant water resources. Over two centuries, we have grown from a small settlement of 50 families to a thriving community of over 2,500 households.
aboutVillage.historyText2: Throughout our history, we have maintained our cultural heritage while embracing progress. Our village has been home to freedom fighters, scholars, artists, and leaders who have contributed significantly to the region's development.
aboutVillage.historyText3: Today, we stand at the intersection of tradition and modernity, committed to preserving our values while adopting innovations that improve quality of life.
aboutVillage.facilitiesSubtitle: Essential services and facilities available in our village
aboutVillage.economyText: Agriculture is the backbone of our village economy, with 100% of families engaged in farming. Our fertile soil and irrigation facilities support diverse crop cultivation including wheat, rice, sugarcane, and vegetables.
aboutVillage.otherOccupationsText: Dairy farming, Small businesses, Service sector, Handicrafts
aboutVillage.cultureSubtitle: Throughout the year, our village comes alive with vibrant celebrations

facilities.communityHallDesc: Modern hall for events and gatherings

festivals.diwaliDesc: Festival of lights celebrated with great enthusiasm
festivals.holiDesc: Colorful spring festival bringing community together

aboutCandidate.heroSubtitle: Committed to serving the community and bringing positive change
aboutCandidate.tagline: Serving the community, building the future
aboutCandidate.introText1: Born and raised in this village, I have witnessed both the challenges and opportunities that our community faces. I am dedicated to transforming our village into a model of progress while preserving our rich cultural heritage.
aboutCandidate.introText2: My vision is to create a village where every family has access to quality education, healthcare, employment opportunities, and modern amenities, while maintaining our strong community bonds and traditional values.
aboutCandidate.messageText1: Dear fellow villagers, our village has immense potential. Together, we can create a community that provides quality education for our children, good healthcare for our families, employment for our youth, and dignity for our elders.
aboutCandidate.messageText2: I promise transparent governance, inclusive development, and tireless efforts to bring government schemes and resources to every household. Your trust and support will empower me to serve you better. Let's work together to make our village a model for others.
